summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1637 for the improvement of the alley in Block Eight (8), David S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from Yesler Way to Washington Street, between Occidental Avenue and First Avenue South, by filling and planking the same, under Ordinance No. 17429 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
